pkgmetadata.longdescription: Co-Data Learning for Bayesian Additive Regression Trees // Estimate prior variable weights for Bayesian Additive Regression Trees (BART). These weights correspond to the probabilities of the variables being selected in the splitting rules of the sum-of-trees. Weights are estimated using empirical Bayes and external information on the explanatory variables (co-data). BART models are fitted using the 'dbarts' 'R' package. See Goedhart and others (2023) doi:10.1002/sim.70004 for details.
